lines.text: Oh, Miss Marsh. I've just made arrangements with Otah to guide us into seach for your father.
You mean that primitive, masterful Indian?
He doesn't look trustworthy to me, Rutledge. I'm glad you'll be along.

[after Stony shoots a supposedly dead dessicated Indian body thought to be a preserved mummy]
I don't think that mummy'll bother us anymore!

[at the end with Stony laughing and looking at Henrietta escorting Lullaaby with a white shirt and tie]
Just wait till Elmer sees you!

[red-faced and embarrassed amid derisive laughter]
Boy, yuh got me!

[looking at half-breed Rutledge after he's been tied to a stake]
Well, begins to lok like a hot time in the old town tonight.
